t: Amazon reportedly sold drugs used for doping months after promising to crack down | The Verge
s: September 17, 2020 - Amazon has removed dozens of listings for peptides, drugs that can be used for doping, after an investigation found 66 examples of such products on the site. Peptides are often used as performance-enhancing drugs, since they can speed recovery from injuries.
